name.baseName: cement production;cement, common portland cement;shaft kiln, <2000 t-cl/d
水泥生产;水泥, 通用硅酸盐水泥;立窑, <2000 t-cl/d

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The shaft kiln holds a market share of 38.18%, and the scale of the clinker production less than 2000 tons per day accounts for 38.18%. In order to reflect the present environmental impact of China's cement industry, taking into account the adjustment of the industry structure and development status in recent years, and considering the differences in cement production technology and the size of different enterprises, China's cement industry is classified into four categories: large new dry process (>4000 tons of clinker per day), medium new dry process (2000~4000 tons of clinker per day), small new dry process (<2000 tons of clinker per day), and shaft kiln (<2001 tons of clinker per day).

立窑，市场份额占38.18%；<2000吨-熟料/日，规模份额占38.18%。为反应现阶段中国水泥工业的环境影响，结合近年来中国水泥工业结构调整和发展现状，考虑到水泥生产技术水平的高低以及不同规模水泥企业的差异，将中国水泥工业分为以下四类：大型新型干法（>4000吨-熟料/日）、中型新型干法（2000~4000吨-熟料/日）、小型新型干法（<2000吨-熟料/日）和立窑（<2000吨-熟料/日）。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: For shaft kilns, the market share accounts for 38.18%; for <2000 tons-clinker/day, the scale share accounts for 38.18%. In order to reflect the environmental impact of China's cement industry at this stage, combined with the structural adjustment and development status of China's cement industry in recent years, and taking into account the level of cement production technology and the differences between cement companies of different sizes, this study divides China's cement industry into the following four categories : Large new dry process (>4000 tons-clinker/day), medium-sized new dry process (2000~4000 tons-clinker/day), small new dry process (<2000 tons-clinker/day) and vertical kiln ( <2000 tons-clinker/day).

立窑，市场份额占38.18%；<2000 吨-熟料/日，规模份额占38.18%。为反应现阶段中国水泥工业的环境影响，结合近年来中国水泥工业结构调整和发展现状，考虑到水泥生产技术水平的高低以及不同规模水泥企业的差异，本研究将中国水泥工业分为以下四类：大 型新型干法（>4000 吨-熟料/日）、中型新型干法 （2000~4000 吨-熟料/日）、小型新型干法（<2000 吨-熟料/日）和立窑（<2000 吨-熟料/日）。
technology.technologicalApplicability: Common Portland cement produced via the shaft kiln process is primarily designed for general construction purposes such as the creation of concrete, mortar, and stucco. This type of cement is utilized in various construction activities, including residential, commercial, and infrastructure projects. The cement's production scale in this dataset is characterized by a daily output of less than 2000 tons of clinker, reflecting medium- to small-scale cement plants.
通过立窑工艺生产的通用硅酸盐水泥主要用于一般建筑目的，如混凝土、砂浆和灰泥的制作。这种类型的水泥被广泛应用于包括住宅、商业和基础设施项目在内的各种建设活动。数据集描述的水泥生产规模以每日生产不足2000吨熟料表征，反映了中小型水泥厂的生产情况。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Take 1 ton of general cement produced in China with a clinker content of 70% as the functional unit. Cement production includes raw meal preparation, clinker calcination and cement grinding.
取中国生产1t熟料含量为70%的通用水泥作为功能单元。水泥生产包括生料制备、熟料煅烧和水泥磨粉。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 姜睿 & 王洪涛. (2010). 中国水泥工业的生命周期评价. 化学工程与装备, 4, 183–187.
姜睿 & 王洪涛. (2010). 中国水泥工业的生命周期评价. 化学工程与装备, 4, 183–187.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: For Life Cycle Assessment purposes, the data set corresponding to cement production via shaft kiln with a clinker output of less than 2000 tons per day should be applied cautiously. Consider the technological applicability and ensure that it aligns with the detailed scope of the assessed system, especially given the market and scale share presented. Users should account for the specific environmental impacts associated with this type of production process and adjust their assessment models accordingly. The differentiated approach within China's cement industry—considering large, medium, and small new dry processes—should be reflected accurately in LCA studies. Ensure consideration of industry structure adjustments and technological development variances over recent years.
在进行生命周期评估时，应谨慎应用每日少于2000吨熟料产量的立窑水泥生产数据集。考虑技术适用性，并确保与评估系统的详细范围保持一致，特别是考虑到呈现的市场份额和规模份额。使用者应考虑与这种生产过程相关的特定环境影响，并相应调整评估模型。在生命周期评估研究中应准确反映中国水泥行业内部采用的分类方法—考虑大型、中型和小型新干法—以及确保对近年来行业结构调整和技术发展差异的考虑。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Limestone
石灰石
Clay
粘土
Gypsum
石膏
Coal consumption during clinker burning. The coal consumption during burning is calculated based on the standard coal consumption per ton of clinker of different production processes and scales.
熟料烧成阶段原煤消耗。烧成煤耗按不同生产工艺和规模的吨熟料标煤耗折算。
Coal consumption during raw material drying. The research takes the coal consumption for drying as 3.50kg/t-cement.
原料烘干阶段原煤消耗。本研究取烘干原煤耗为3.50kg/t-水泥。
Electricity consumption during clinker burning. The electricity consumption is calculated based on the comprehensive electricity consumption for different production processes and scales.
烧成电耗。电力消耗按不同生产工艺和规模的综合电耗计算。

Other electricity consumption. Electricity is mainly used for the drive of raw material crushing, raw mill, cement mill, dust removal equipment and other machinery. Electricity consumption is calculated according to the comprehensive electricity consumption of different production processes and scales.
其他电耗。电力主要用于原料破碎、生料磨、水泥磨、除尘设备等机械的驱动，电力消耗按不同生产工艺和规模的综合电耗计算。

The CO2 emissions are calculated theoretically and consist of two aspects: on the one hand from the use of coal for calcining clinker and on the other hand from the decomposition of carbonates during the calcination of raw materials such as limestone (CaCO3) to produce lime (CaO).
CO2的排放量来自于理论计算，包括两方面：一方面来源于煅烧熟料燃煤的使用，另一方面来源于煅烧石灰石（CaCO3）等原料生成石灰（CaO）过程碳酸盐的分解。
SO2. SO2, NOX, and COD emissions were obtained from the results of the recent China Cement Industry Pollution Source Survey.
SO2。SO2、NOx和COD排放量来自于近年中国水泥工业污染源普查统计结果。
NOX. SO2, NOX, and COD emissions were obtained from the results of the recent China Cement Industry Pollution Source Survey.
NOx。SO2、NOx和COD排放量来自于近年中国水泥工业污染源普查统计结果。

<PM2.5. The graded emissions of particulate matter from cement products in functional units were calculated based on the investigation of particulate matter production coefficients of different cement production processes and scales by the pollution source census, as well as the proportion of particulate matter generated by different cement production equipment and the share of dust removal technology application and graded dust removal efficiency.
<PM2.5。本研究根据污染源普查对不同水泥生产工艺和规模的颗粒物产污系数的调查，以及不同水泥生产设备产生的颗粒物比例和除尘技术的应用份额及分级除尘效率，计算功能单元水泥产品的颗粒物分级排放量。

PM2.5-10. The graded emissions of particulate matter from cement products in functional units were calculated based on the investigation of particulate matter production coefficients of different cement production processes and scales by the pollution source census, as well as the proportion of particulate matter generated by different cement production equipment and the share of dust removal technology application and graded dust removal efficiency.
PM2.5-10。本研究根据污染源普查对不同水泥生产工艺和规模的颗粒物产污系数的调查，以及不同水泥生产设备产生的颗粒物比例和除尘技术的应用份额及分级除尘效率，计算功能单元水泥产品的颗粒物分级排放量。

>PM10. The graded emissions of particulate matter from cement products in functional units were calculated based on the investigation of particulate matter production coefficients of different cement production processes and scales by the pollution source census, as well as the proportion of particulate matter generated by different cement production equipment and the share of dust removal technology application and graded dust removal efficiency.
>PM10。本研究根据污染源普查对不同水泥生产工艺和规模的颗粒物产污系数的调查，以及不同水泥生产设备产生的颗粒物比例和除尘技术的应用份额及分级除尘效率，计算功能单元水泥产品的颗粒物分级排放量。
COD. SO2, NOX, and COD emissions were obtained from the results of the recent China Cement Industry Pollution Source Survey.
COD。SO2、NOx和COD排放量来自于近年中国水泥工业污染源普查统计结果。
General cement with a clinker content of 70%.
熟料含量为70%的通用水泥。
